#include<iostream>
#include<sstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    double w,b;
    //double b,rb;
    int w1;
    cin>>w>>b;
    w1=w;
    cout<<fixed;
    cout<<setprecision(2);
    if((w+0.5)>b)
    cout<<b;
    else if((w1%5)==0)
    cout<<b-w-0.5;
    else
    cout<<b;

    return 0;
}
